price: Kuma suna nẽman ka da gaggauta azãba, to, bã dõmin ajali ƙayyadadde ba, dã azãba ta jẽ musu kuma lalle dã tanã iske su bisa ia abke, alhãli kuwa sũ ba su sani ba.
arabic: وَيَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَكَ بِٱلۡعَذَابِ وَلَوۡلَآ أَجَلٞ مُّسَمّٗى لَّجَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُۚ وَلَيَأۡتِيَنَّهُم بَغۡتَةٗ وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wayastaʿjilūnaka bil-ʿadhābi walawlā ajalun musamman lajāahumu al-ʿadhābu walayatiyannahum baghtatan wahum lā yashʿurūna
translations: And they ask you to hasten
But it will surely come to them
